About Our Story

Founded by technology leaders passionate about making enterprise-level AI accessible to mid-size organizations.

Our Mission

To empower mid-size organizations with strategic AI consulting and technology solutions that enable them to compete at enterprise levels while maintaining their agility and innovation culture.

Meet Our Founders

Leadership combining strategic vision with deep technical expertise

DV

David Velvethy

CEO & Co-Founder

Strategic technology leader with extensive experience in AI consulting and business transformation. David specializes in bridging the gap between cutting-edge technology and tangible business value, helping mid-size organizations leverage AI for competitive advantage.

JM

Jan Mikes

CTO & Co-Founder

Technical architect and engineering leader with deep expertise in backend systems, DevOps, and AI implementation. Jan leads our technical delivery, ensuring robust, scalable solutions that meet the highest standards of quality and performance.

Key Expertise

Solution Architecture Backend Development DevOps & Cloud Agentic AI Systems
